segments.text: I'm genuinely astonished by the scene unfolding before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can anyone be so completely unaware of their immediate surroundings?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is practically a waterfall, spilling all over the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And the woman is standing right in it, drying a dish with such serene concentration.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's utterly baffling that she doesn't feel the water or hear the splashing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her neutrality in the face of this deluge is truly remarkable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then there are the children, brazenly attempting to steal cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is on a stool that looks like it's about to collapse at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, an accomplice in this high-stakes snack raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the calm garden outside the window is quite stark.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but wonder what thoughts are occupying the woman's mind.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This level of obliviousness combined with the children's audacity is simply incredible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: My jaw literally dropped when I first took it all in.
segments.speaker: PAR
